2Hit.Name: 2-Hit
2Hit.Description: Normal weapon attacks have a chance of hitting twice.

WarCry.Name: War Cry
WarCry.Description: Increase attack Power at the expense of defense.

HellCry.Name: Hell Cry
HellCry.Description: Abandon defense and stamina for greatly strengthened attacks.

ArmHeal.Name: Arm Heal
ArmHeal.Description: Regain the use of bound arms.

FleeL.Name: Flee
FleeL.Description: Sacrifice HP to escape from battle to the previous floor.
FleeL.Note: This skill cannot be used in unescapable battles.

Tornado.Name: Tornado
Tornado.Description: A whirling sword skill that strikes adjacent enemies.

Allslash.Name: Allslash
Allslash.Description: A sword skill that hits a group of enemies 2-4 times.

Blazer.Name: Blazer
Blazer.Description: Sword skill that follows fire magic with a flaming slash.
Blazer.Note: This is a chaser skill, meaning if the target is attacked with fire magic, character will follow up with a fire slash. This skill only deal elemental damage, though the initial strike is physical,

Freezer.Name: Freezer
Freezer.Description: Sword skill that follows ice magic with a freezing slash.
Freezer.Note: This is a chaser skill, meaning if the target is attacked with ice magic, character will follow up with a ice slash. This skill only deal elemental damage, though the initial strike is physical,

Shocker.Name: Shocker
Shocker.Description: Sword skill that follows volt magic with a shocking slash.
Shocker.Note: This is a chaser skill, meaning if the target is attacked with volt magic, character will follow up with a volt slash. This skill only deal elemental damage, though the initial strike is physical,

Stunner.Name: Stunner
Stunner.Description: An axe attack that puts the enemy off-balance.

Silencer.Name: Silencer
Silencer.Description: An axe skill with a chance of binding the enemy's head.

Bows.Name: Bows
Bows.Description: Increase bow damage. Needed to learn bow skills.

Ambush.Name: Ambush
Ambush.Description: Increase the chance of getting a preemptive attack.

Aware.Name: Aware
Aware.Description: Lessens the chances of enemy preemptive attacks.
Aware.Note: Works on scripted event too! Also I'm not sure why it's classified as search skill but ambush is passive.

1stHit.Name: 1st Hit
1stHit.Description: Chance of acting first in the next turn, regarless of speed.

Trickery.Name: Trickery
Trickery.Description: Lower the enemy's accuracy with evasive footwork.

Quicken.Name: Quicken
Quicken.Description: Motivates the entire party to sprint, increasing their speed.

Cloak.Name: Cloak
Cloak.Description: Hide in the shadows so the enemy won't target you.

Escape.Name: Escape
Escape.Description: Incrase chances of escape. At high levels, it raises defense.

1stTurn.Name: 1st Turn
1stTurn.Description: The targeted party member may act first in battle.

Multihit.Name: Multihit
Multihit.Description: Fire two arrows at once, or three at high levels.

Disable.Name: Disable
Disable.Description: Aim for the opponent's feet for a chance of binding it legs.

Apollon.Name: Apollon
Apollon.Description: This ultimate shot takes 3 turns for its full effect to be felt.
Apollon.Note: Starting from level 5, there is a chance that this skill with stun the enemy

OwlEye.Name: Owl-Eye
OwlEye.Description: Track faraway FOEs with the Survivalist's keen senses.

StalkerS.Name: Stalker
StalkerS.Description: Cautious steps reduce the chances of enemy encounters.

StalkerT.Name: Stalker
StalkerT.Description: Cautious steps reduce the chances of enemy encounters.

StalkerP.Name: Stalker
StalkerP.Description: Cautious steps reduce the chances of enemy encounters.

CureP.Name: Cure
CureP.Description: Protector skill that heals a small amount of Hp.

CureIIP.Name: Cure II
CureIIP.Description: Protector skill that heals a medium amount of Hp.

Antifire.Name: Antifire
Antifire.Description: Shield skill that briefly raises the party's fire resistance.
Antifire.Note: Only last until end of the current turn. Starting from Level 6, percentage of the incoming fire damage will heal you. However, this skill is bugged: level 1 to 5 also prevent abnormal conditions, but starting from level 6, this effect is gone.

Antivolt.Name: Antivolt
Antivolt.Description: Shield skill that briefly raises the party's volt resistance.
Antivolt.Note: Only last until end of the current turn. Starting from Level 6, percentage of the incoming volt damage will heal you. However, this skill is bugged: level 1 to 5 also prevent abnormal conditions, but starting from level 6, this effect is gone.

Anticold.Name: Anticold
Anticold.Description: Shield skill that briefly raises the party's ice resistance.
Anticold.Note: Only last until end of the current turn. Starting from Level 6, percentage of the incoming ice damage will heal you. However, this skill is bugged: level 1 to 5 also prevent abnormal conditions, but starting from level 6, this effect is gone.

Shields.Name: Shields
Shields.Description: Increase elemental defense. Needed to learn Shield skills.

FGuard.Name: F. Guard
FGuard.Description: Shield skill that may take damage in the front line's place.
FGuard.Note: Only last until end of the current turn.

BGuard.Name: B. Guard
BGuard.Description: Shield skill that may take damage in the backline line's place.
BGuard.Note: Only last until end of the current turn.

Defender.Name: Defender
Defender.Description: Organizes the party into a formation of increased defense.

Fortify.Name: Fortify
Fortify.Description: Digs in for ironclad defense against physical damage.

Smite.Name: Smite
Smite.Description: Shield skill that deals a powerful bash to the enemy
Smite.Note: Has a chance to arm bind enemies starting from level 5

Parry.Name: Parry
Parry.Description: Await the enemy's attack to parry it and negate the damage.

FleeP.Name: Flee
FleeP.Description: Sacrifice HP to escape from battle to the previous floor.
FleeP.Note: This skill cannot be used in unescapable battles.

Provoke.Name: Provoke
Provoke.Description: Increase defense and divert the enemy's attention to you.

Aegis.Name: Aegis
Aegis.Description: Preparedness for death makes it possible to survive with 1 HP.

EnGarde.Name: En Garde
EnGarde.Description: Chance of automatically blocking enemy attacks.

CloakD.Name: Cloak
CloakD.Description: Hide in the shadows so the enemy won't target you.

Whips.Name: Whips
Whips.Description: Increase whip damage. Needed to learn whip skills.

Viper.Name: Viper
Viper.Description: Whip attack with a chance of poisoning the enemy.

Climax.Name: Climax
Climax.Description: Whip skill that may kill and drain enemies with low HP.

Gag.Name: Gag
Gag.Description: Whip attack with a chance of binding the enemy's head.
Gag.Note: Level 3 indeed have higher bind chance than Level 4!

Shackles.Name: Shackles
Shackles.Description: Whip attack with a chance of binding the enemy's legs.
Shackles.Note: Level 3 indeed have higher bind chance than Level 4!

Cuffs.Name: Cuffs
Cuffs.Description: Whip attack with a chance of binding the enemy's arms.
Cuffs.Note: JP wiki have binding chance at 38 at level and 41 at level 4, but the data I was given is the opposite. So... I don't know which is correct.

Ecstasy.Name: Ecstasy
Ecstasy.Description: Whip attack that does incredible damage to totally bound enemies.

Fury.Name: Fury
Fury.Description: Increase damage dealth when HP is low.

BoostUp.Name: Boost Up
BoostUp.Description: Increase the improvement gained when boosted.

Bait.Name: Bait
Bait.Description: Sword skill that uses comrades on either side to bait a trap.
Bait.Note: Counter attack when you or adjacent allies are attacked by a physical attack.

Petrify.Name: Petrify
Petrify.Description: Sword stab at the enemy's muscles wihth a chance of stoning.

Drain.Name: Drain
Drain.Description: Sword stab that drains the enemy's HP through the blade.
Drain.Note: Regen own hp with a percentage of the damage dealt

Mirage.Name: Mirage
Mirage.Description: Sword stab at the enemy's skull with a chance of confusing it.

Nerve.Name: Nerve
Nerve.Description: Sword stab at the enemy's nerves with a chance of paralyzing it.

Hypnos.Name: Hypnos
Hypnos.Description: Sword stab with a chance of putting the enemy to sleep.

Scavenge.Name: Scavenge
Scavenge.Description: Increase chances of the enemy dropping an item.

ScavengeA.Name: Scavenge
ScavengeA.Description: Increase chances of the enemy dropping an item.

TpRegen.Name: TP Regen
TpRegen.Description: Restores a small amount of TP after every turn in battle.

TpRegenA.Name: TP Regen
TpRegenA.Description: Restores a small amount of TP after every turn in battle.

Healer.Name: Healer
Healer.Description: Increase healing effectiveness. Needed to learn healing magic.

Cure.Name: Cure
Cure.Description: Restores a small amount of Hp.

Regen.Name: Regen
Regen.Description: Restores a small amount of Hp to one party member each turn.

Salve.Name: Salve
Salve.Description: Restores a small amount of Hp to the entire party.

Immunize.Name: Immunize
Immunize.Description: Confers resistance to all elements on the party.
Immunize.Note: This skill reduces damage for all types of damage. Not just elemental damage like the description says.

CPR.Name: CPR
CPR.Description: Chance that party members will survive mortal blows with 1 HP

SalveII.Name: Salve II
SalveII.Description: Restores a medium amount of Hp to the entire party.

CureII.Name: Cure II
CureII.Description: Restores a medium amount of Hp.

Revive.Name: Revive
Revive.Description: Bring the dead back to life.

Refresh.Name: Refresh
Refresh.Description: Removes status ailments from the entire party.

HTouch.Name: H. Touch
HTouch.Description: Heals up to a set amount outside battle for a small amount of TP

Unbind.Name: Unbind
Unbind.Description: Removes bindings from one party member.

PatchUp.Name: Patch Up
PatchUp.Description: Small healing after battles with no TP cost.

Caduceus.Name: Caduceus
Caduceus.Description: A heavy staff attack with a chance of stunning the enemy

Sight.Name: Sight
Sight.Description: Conjure sight to see all FOEs on the map.
Sight.Note: Covers almost entire floor. But have to be stationary. Once you move, the effect ends.

SightR.Name: Sight
SightR.Description: Increase attack damage at night or when blinded.

Warp.Name: Warp
Warp.Description: Conjure a warp to the last visited Geomagnetic Field.

FireUp.Name: Fire Up
FireUp.Description: Increase fire damage. Needed to learn fire skills.

Toxins.Name: Toxins
Toxins.Description: Increase poison damage. Needed to learn poison skills.
Toxins.Note: This skill is bugged and does not do anything

IceUp.Name: Ice Up
IceUp.Description: Increase ice damage. Needed to learn ice skills.

VoltUp.Name: Volt Up
VoltUp.Description: Increase volt damage. Needed to learn volt skills.

Fire.Name: Fire
Fire.Description: Conjure forth fire to attack the enemy.

Ice.Name: Ice
Ice.Description: Conjure forth ice to attack the enemy.

Volt.Name: Volt
Volt.Description: Conjure forth voltage to attack the enemy.

Flame.Name: Flame
Flame.Description: Conjure forth flame to attack the enemy.

Freeze.Name: Freeze
Freeze.Description: Conjure forth icicles to attack the enemy.

Thunder.Name: Thunder
Thunder.Description: Conjure forth lightning to attack the enemy.

Inferno.Name: Inferno
Inferno.Description: Conjure forth an inferno to attack the enemy.

Cocytus.Name: Cocytus
Cocytus.Description: Conjure forth a blizzard to attack the enemy.

Thor.Name: Thor
Thor.Description: Conjure forth divine thunder to attack the enemy.

Poison.Name: Poison
Poison.Description: Chance of transmuting an enemy's blood to poison.

Venom.Name: Venom
Venom.Description: Chance of transmuting all enemy's blood to poison.

Divinity.Name: Divinity
Divinity.Description: Increase experience for the entire party.

Return.Name: Return
Return.Description: Nostalgic tune that takes you back to the previous floor.

Relaxing.Name: Relaxing
Relaxing.Description: A relaxing song recovers party TP by a small amount each turn.

Healing.Name: Healing
Healing.Description: A healing song recovers party HP by a small amount each turn.

Stamina.Name: Stamina
Stamina.Description: Tribal rhythm that increases the party's maximum HP.

Bravery.Name: Bravery
Bravery.Description: Pulsing beat that increases the party's strength.

Shelter.Name: Shelter
Shelter.Description: Triumphant anthem that increases the party's defense.

Mercury.Name: Mercury
Mercury.Description: High-tempo piece that increases the party's speed.

Erasure.Name: Erasure
Erasure.Description: A startling song that erases the enemy's status benefits.

Recovery.Name: Recovery
Recovery.Description: Blessed aria that recovers party status ailments more quickly.

Shock.Name: Shock
Shock.Description: Song that imbues a party member's weapon with voltage.

Frost.Name: Frost
Frost.Description: Song that imbues a party member's weapon with ice.

Blaze.Name: Blaze
Blaze.Description: Song that imbues a party member's weapon with fire.

Ifrit.Name: Ifrit
Ifrit.Description: Party's fire resistance raised while the enemy's decreases.

Ymir.Name: Ymir
Ymir.Description: Party's ice resistance raised while the enemy's decreases.

Taranis.Name: Taranis
Taranis.Description: Party's volt resistance raised while the enemy's decreases.

Katanas.Name: Katanas
Katanas.Description: Increase katana damage. Needed to learn katana skills.

Overhead.Name: Overhead
Overhead.Description: Temporary Overhead stance that increases attack and defense.
Overhead.Note: Even though you can boost this skill, but it doesn't actually provide boosted stats.

Seigan.Name: Seigan
Seigan.Description: Temporary Seigan stance that increases attack and defense.
Seigan.Note: Even though you can boost this skill, but it doesn't actually provide boosted stats.

Iai.Name: Iai
Iai.Description: Temporary Iai stance that increases speed.
Iai.Note: Even though you can boost this skill, but it doesn't actually provide boosted stats.

Zamba.Name: Zamba
Zamba.Description: Strong katana slice from the Overhead stance.

Mikiri.Name: Mikiri
Mikiri.Description: Deflect an enemy attack with a katana from the Seigan stance.
Mikiri.Note: This skill can be boosted, but no point boosting really

Kubiuchi.Name: Kubiuchi
Kubiuchi.Description: Chance of an instant katana kill from the Iai stance.

Midareba.Name: Midareba
Midareba.Description: Repeated katana slashes from the Overhead stance.

Koteuchi.Name: Koteuchi
Koteuchi.Description: Immobilize an enemy's arm with a katana from the Seigan stance.

Orochi.Name: Orochi
Orochi.Description: Execute an fire katana strike from the Overhead stance.

Raizuki.Name: Raizuki
Raizuki.Description: Execute an volt katana strike from the Seigan stance.

Hyosetsu.Name: Hyosetsu
Hyosetsu.Description: Execute an ice katana strike from the Iai stance.

Kesagiri.Name: Kesagiri
Kesagiri.Description: Katana skill of stepping forward while slicing.

Ibuki.Name: Ibuki
Ibuki.Description: Heal Hp by taking a deep breath.

Sapping.Name: Sapping
Sapping.Description: Curse that decreases all enemies' strength.

Fraility.Name: Fraility
Fraility.Description: Curse that decreases all enemies' defense.

Leaden.Name: Leaden
Leaden.Description: Curse that decreases all enemies' speed.

Cranial.Name: Leaden
Cranial.Description: Curse with a chance of binding an enemy's head.

Abdomen.Name: Abdomen
Abdomen.Description: Curse with a chance of binding an enemy's arms.

Immobile.Name: Immobile
Immobile.Description: Curse with a chance of binding an enemy's legs.

Blinding.Name: Blinding
Blinding.Description: Curse with a chance of blinding all enemies.

Corrupt.Name: Corrupt
Corrupt.Description: Curse with a chance of giving all enemies cursed status.

Torpor.Name: Torpor
Torpor.Description: Curse with a chance of putting all enemies to sleep.

Relapse.Name: Relapse
Relapse.Description: Curse that decreases enemies' recovery from status ailments.

EvilEye.Name: Evil Eye
EvilEye.Description: Evil gaze that has a chance of terrifying the enemy.

Lure.Name: Lure
Lure.Description: Cureses the party to encounter more enemies.

Paralyze.Name: Paralyze
Paralyze.Description: Commands a terrified enemy to remain motionless.
Paralyze.Note: This skill can be boosted, but no point boosting really

Betrayal.Name: Betrayal
Betrayal.Description: Commands a terrified enemy to attack its own comrades.
Betrayal.Note: This skill can be boosted, but no point boosting really

Suicide.Name: Suicide
Suicide.Description: Commands a terrified enemy to take its own life.

Stagger.Name: Stagger
Stagger.Description: Chance of stunning the enemies at the beginning of battle..

Revenge.Name: Revenge
Revenge.Description: Curse that deals damage to an enemy when struck.

Mine.Name: Mine
Mine.Description: Mine for materials at item points.
Mine.Note: There is a chance to get nothing from a gathering point. Leveling the skill reduces the chance to get nothing. For example if an gathering spot has 80% to get an item, then at level 2, it will have 80 * 1.02 = 81.6% chance to get an item.

Take.Name: Take
Take.Description: Gather plants for materials at item points.
Take.Note: There is a chance to get nothing from a gathering point. Leveling the skill reduces the chance to get nothing. For example if an gathering spot has 80% to get an item, then at level 2, it will have 80 * 1.02 = 81.6% chance to get an item.

Chop.Name: Chop
Chop.Description: Chop wood for materials at item points.
Chop.Note: There is a chance to get nothing from a gathering point. Leveling the skill reduces the chance to get nothing. For example if an gathering spot has 80% to get an item, then at level 2, it will have 80 * 1.02 = 81.6% chance to get an item.

TakeS.Name: Take
TakeS.Description: Gather plants for materials at item points.
TakeS.Note: There is a chance to get nothing from a gathering point. Leveling the skill reduces the chance to get nothing. For example if an gathering spot has 80% to get an item, then at level 2, it will have 80 * 1.02 = 81.6% chance to get an item.

ChopS.Name: Chop
ChopS.Description: Chop wood for materials at item points.
ChopS.Note: There is a chance to get nothing from a gathering point. Leveling the skill reduces the chance to get nothing. For example if an gathering spot has 80% to get an item, then at level 2, it will have 80 * 1.02 = 81.6% chance to get an item.
